SA09n999:3: śubhamālakṣya kṛtā vai kāścidāryāgītayastvayā ca śravyāḥ ||1 ||
SA09n999:4: dārumayī hyapi pratimā sampūjyate kā'pi sugatasya vidvadbhiḥ |
SA09n999:5: tathā'manojñaṃ kāvyaṃ saddharmāśrayācca mamedaṃ na nindyam ||2 ||
SA09n999:7: ākalpitaṃ tu sudhayā nanvatidhavalaṃ na dṛśyate candrikayā? ||3 ||
SA09n999:13: dānaṃ deyaṃ vidhinā janmāntareṣu na dānāt paraṃ mitram ||6 ||
SA09n999:15: carācarapratiṣṭhaṃ tu guṇāśrayaṃ bhūvacca rājate śīlam ||7 ||
SA09n999:18: yatra pūjā pitṝṇāṃ kulaṃ tadācāryabrahmabhiḥ samṛddham |
SA09n999:23: labhate hi pumān strī vā suramyakāmāvacarādidevakāyam ||11 ||
SA09n999:30: kṣāntisamaṃ naiva tapastatastvayā na krodhāvasaro deyaḥ |
SA09n999:33: vairairebhiḥ kalahastyajati ya etad vairaṃ sa sukhaṃ śete ||16 ||
SA09n999:34: jale'vanau pāṣāṇe citramiva cittaṃ tridhā khalu sattvānām |
SA09n999:38: caturvidhā vai puruṣāḥ prakāśātprakāśe tamasastamasi punaḥ |
SA09n999:39: tamaḥ prakāśād gacchati tamasastejasi pudgalo varaḥ prathamaḥ ||19 ||
SA09n999:41: apakve'pakvaṃ tathā pakve pakvamiva bhāti cāturvidhyam ||20 ||
SA09n999:42: paradārānna tu paśyed dṛṣṭe ca jñeyā avasthānurūpyeṇa |
SA09n999:47: pāśaistasya hi baddho bhavacārake lokaḥ sa prahātavyaḥ ||23 ||
SA09n999:48: calādhruvāṇi ṣaḍakṣāṇi jayanti samare vā śatrūnapi caike |
SA09n999:49: tayośca sudhiyaḥ prathamaṃ varamindriyavijetāraṃ ca manyante ||24 ||
SA09n999:52: kṛmipīḍito hi kuṣṭhī sukhalipsayā ca yathā vahnimāśrayate |
SA09n999:53: pīḍā na yāti śāntiṃ tathaiva hi kāmāsaktirapi boddhavyā ||26 ||
SA09n999:54: paramārthaṃ prativettuṃ sarvabhāveṣu savidhi manasi nidhāyaiva |
SA09n999:55: sa ca khalu bhāvayitavyo na hi tattulyo'paro guṇayuto dharmaḥ ||27 ||
SA09n999:56: sukulīno'pi na pūjyo jñānaśīlavimukho śrutirūpavān pumān |
SA09n999:61: pāpaṃ nācaraṇiyaṃ yataḥ katamo'pi na narakaphalasya bhāgī ||30 ||
SA09n999:62: na ca kṛntati pāpakarma tatkṣaṇamastrapātavat kamapi pāpinam |
SA09n999:65: apatrapā hrī muninā mudhaivāparadhanāni hi sādhāraṇāni ||32 ||
SA09n999:69: santoṣo'nuṣṭheyaḥ dhanaṃ vinaiva sa dhanikaḥ sati santoṣe ||34 ||
SA09n999:70: yathā samṛddhāḥ puruṣā duḥkhino bhavanti naiva tathā'lpecchukāḥ |
SA09n999:74: patnī tyājyā trividhā prakṛtyā ripusambaddhā svaghātikeva |
SA09n999:79: kāyasthityai nitarāṃ na ca saundaryagarvamānārthaṃ sevyam ||38 ||
SA09n999:80: dinamakhilaṃ śubhakārye yāpayed rātrerādyantau yāmau ca |
SA09n999:81: dhīman, madhye yāme śayīta yato hi na bhaved viphalā nidrā ||39 ||
SA09n999:84: kāmān prītivicārau sukhañca duḥkhañca vihāya caturbhireva |
SA09n999:89: pāpaṃ tathaiva cālpaṃ nāśayatyalpakuśalaṃ na pūrṇakuśalam ||43 ||
SA09n999:90: auddhatyaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ vyāpādaḥ styānamiddhe ca kāmecchā |
SA09n999:95: punaḥ punastu cintayā pratipakṣeṇaivaṃ prahīyate mānaḥ ||46 ||
SA09n999:100: uktaṃ rūpaṃ nātmā rūpavāṃśca nātmā rūpe naivātmā |
SA09n999:101: na cātmanyasti rūpaṃ śūnyamevaṃ skandhacatuṣkamapi jñeyam ||49 ||
SA09n999:102: skandhā na hi jāyante yadṛcchayā na prakṛtīśvarakālebhyaḥ |
SA09n999:103: nāhetoḥ svabhāvato jñeyā ajñānena tṛṣṇayā jātāḥ ||50 ||
SA09n999:104: kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃharate prajāḥ |
SA09n999:105: kālaḥ supteṣu jāgarti kālo hi duratikramaḥ ||
SA09n999:108: ātmāpekṣo mokṣaḥ parasmānna labhyate kimapi sāhāyyam |
SA09n999:117: rajaḥsadharmī cānte sadā viyogaśīlo naśvaro jñeyaḥ ||56 ||
SA09n999:119: dhūlimātraṃ hi mūrtāḥ kā kathā durbalavapuṣāṃ mānavānām ||57 ||
SA09n999:129: sevyaḥ sadā supuruṣaḥ śamaḥ prāpto yato jinamapekṣya bahubhiḥ ||62 ||
SA09n999:131: mleccho jaḍaśca sattvo yo hyutpanno buddhavirahite ||63 ||
SA09n999:133: ebhī rahito bhūtvā kṣaṇaṃ labdhvā janmanivṛttau prayateta ||64 ||
SA09n999:135: virajya tataḥ śṛṇu tāvad doṣānetasyāvagacchan naradeva ||65 ||
SA09n999:136: mitratvena ca śatruḥ putratvena pitā'mbā ca bhāryātvena |
SA09n999:142: lokapūjyo'pi śakraḥ patati ca punaḥ karmavaśāddhi saṃsāre |
SA09n999:143: tadvacca cakravartī rājā'pi punarbhavati hi dāso loke ||69 ||
SA09n999:148: devāṅganāsevite nandane ramye copavane ca vihṛtya |
SA09n999:151: snātvā punaśca narake kṣāroṣṇodakavaitaraṇyāṃ hi patanti ||73 ||
SA09n999:154: padamavāpya suryendvoḥ svakāyaprabhayā pradīpya hi saṃsāram |
SA09n999:155: tamasi ca ghane praviṣṭaḥ prasāritamapi ca svīyakaraṃ na paśyati ||75 ||
SA09n999:159: rauravāvīcyādau hi saṃghāte cāpi narake sadā duḥkham ||77 ||
SA09n999:160: niṣpīḍyante tilavat kecanānye cūrṇavat peṣyante ca |
SA09n999:163: āropyante kecana sakaṇṭake taptāyase sadā śūle ||79 ||
SA09n999:165: utthāya karau vivaśā luñcyante tīkṣṇanakhatuṇḍaiśca kākaiḥ ||80 ||
SA09n999:167: vṛddhaṃ vraṇantvasahyaṃ bhakṣyamāṇaṃ rudanti cākulā bhūmyām ||81 ||
SA09n999:168: dahyante'gnikuṇḍeṣu tena tadānanāni ca bhavanti vivṛtāni |
SA09n999:170: śvāsāvarodhasamaye pāpaḥ kālaṃkṛte ca narakaṃ prayāti |
SA09n999:172: śrutvā dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā paṭhitvā cāpi citrāṅkanaṃ narakasya |
SA09n999:174: yathā samastasukhānāṃ tṛṣṇākṣaya eva sarvottamaṃ sukhamiti |
SA09n999:178: nārakīyaduḥkhasya hi tatrāpnoti samatāṃ na laghukalāṃ cāpi ||86 ||
SA09n999:182: bhavataivaṃ yatanīyaṃ śaktyā yena tadaṇumātraṃ na śiṣyeta ||88 ||
SA09n999:183: tiryagyoniṣu nānā duḥkhāni bhavanti ca badhabandhanādīni |
SA09n999:186: yojyante khalu vivaśā anye padamuṣṭikaśāṅkuśaiḥ paśavaśca ||90 ||
SA09n999:187: pretayonau na kṣayaṃ yātīṣṭālābhajanitā duḥkhadhārā ca |
SA09n999:190: tacca pīḍitaṃ kṣudhayā kṣiptamaśuci vastu na pratikārakṣamam ||92 ||
SA09n999:193: nimnakoṭikaiḥ kaiścit pūyaraktādyaśucīni na ca labhyante |
SA09n999:195: candro grīṣme taptaḥ śaitye śīto bhānuśca hyetebhyaḥ |
SA09n999:196: teṣāṃ dṛṣṭi pātācca niṣphalāstaravo nadyaśca śuṣyante ||95 ||
SA09n999:198: na ca mriyante kecit pañca vā daśa sahasravarṣāṇi sattvāḥ ||96 ||
SA09n999:202: evaṃ vicintya tajjñaiḥ kṣaratsukhāya na tṛṣṇā kāryā svarge ||98 ||
SA09n999:203: vaivarṇyaṃ dehasya svāsane na ratirmlāyate'pi mālā ca |
SA09n999:210: na kurvanti dhīmanto janmāvaraṇācca te satyadarśanāni ||102 ||
SA09n999:213: jvalite śirasi ca vasane tannivṛttyupāyamupekṣya tvaritameva |
SA09n999:219: prajñābhāve dhyānaṃ dhyānābhāve'pi na jāyate sā prajñā |
SA09n999:222: loke na cintanīyā yato tairnāpnoti cittameva śāntim ||108 ||
SA09n999:223: evaṃ proktaṃ muninā'vidyayā karma karmaṇā ca vijñānam |
SA09n999:224: tasmācca nāmarūpaṃ tataḥ ṣaḍāyatanāni tataḥ sparśā vai ||109 ||
SA09n999:225: tata utpannā vittirvedanāśrayeṇa jāyate khalu tṛṣṇā |
SA09n999:226: tasyāścopādānaṃ tato bhavo'pi bhavācca jāyate jātiḥ ||110 ||
SA09n999:230: samyagimaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa ca paśyati tattvadarśinaṃ buddhameva ||112 ||
SA09n999:233: jātiriyaṃ duḥkhameva tṛṣṇā ca tasya samudayo mahān jñeyaḥ |
SA09n999:236: kroḍe śriyaśca yeṣāṃ gṛhasthāstaranti kleśanadīṃ jñānāt ||115 ||
SA09n999:238: nāvataranti ca gaganāt te'pi pṛthagjanāḥ kleśavaśā hi pūrvam ||116 ||
SA09n999:239: cittaṃ hi dharmamūlaṃ bhagavatoktamatastadapi sādhu damayecca |
SA09n999:243: caryāguṇān sevasva śikṣāmācara jīvanaṃ ca kuru sārtham ||118 ||
SA09n999:244: sarveṣāṃ kuśalāni tu sarvārthamanumodya svacaryātrayīṃ ca |
SA09n999:251: loke prasārya śamayan narān yuvatisukharatadevāṃśca bhūmau ||122 ||
